revised_title: Equal Reflexion and Transmission Coefficients in One-Dimensional Potential Barriers
tldr: The author investigates one-dimensional potential barriers and shows that there exists a class of potential pairs that yield the same reflexion and transmission coefficients. This discovery is connected to the theory of solitons and the Korteweg-deVries equation. The findings can be applied to the study of black hole perturbations in general relativity.
